00011 // Class contains the result of a linear fit
00012 
00013 namespace TBTrack {
00014 
00015   class LinearFitResult {
00016 
00017   public:
00018     LinearFitResult(double c, int n, const TVectorD &p, const TMatrixDSym &e);  
00019 
00020     // Returns the chi-squared value of the fit
00021     double chiSquared() const;
00022 
00023     // Returns the number of degrees of freedom
00024     int numberOfDof() const;
00025     
00026     // Returns the probability of the fit
00027     double probability() const;
00028 
00029     // Returns the N parameters resulting from the fit
00030     const TVectorD& parameters() const;
00031 
00032     // Returns the NxN error matrix of the fit
00033     const TMatrixDSym& errors() const;
00034     
00035     // Returns the probability comparing the fit result to parameters
00036     double probability(const TVectorD &p) const;
00037 
00038     std::ostream& print(std::ostream &o=std::cout, const std::string &s="") const;
00039
